> S.L.A.T.E. is a local-first AI agent orchestration framework with GPU support, Kubernetes deployment, and security-first design.

# Project Overview

S.L.A.T.E. stands for: Synchronized Living Architecture for Transformation and Evolution

## Core Features

- Local-first AI inference using Ollama with dual GPU support
- Kubernetes-native deployment with Kustomize and Helm
- VS Code extension (@slate chat participant) with 30+ LM tools
- Claude Code integration with MCP server and 12 tools
- GitHub Actions self-hosted runner with GPU acceleration
- ActionGuard security system blocking dangerous patterns
- Adaptive instruction layer driven by Kubernetes ConfigMaps

## Quick Links

- Repository: https://github.com/SynchronizedLivingArchitecture/S.L.A.T.E
- Documentation: https://synchronizedlivingarchitecture.github.io/S.L.A.T.E/
- Installation: Run `python install_slate.py` after cloning

## Key Files

- CLAUDE.md: Main development guidelines and commands
- AGENTS.md: Agent instructions and routing rules
- .github/copilot-instructions.md: GitHub Copilot configuration
- .github/agents/slate.agent.md: SLATE agent definition
- collections/slate.collection.yml: Awesome-copilot collection manifest

## Architecture

```
slate/              # Core SDK modules (30+ Python files)
agents/             # API servers (FastAPI dashboard)
plugins/            # VS Code extensions
skills/             # Copilot Chat skills
instructions/       # Coding standards with applyTo patterns
prompts/            # Task-specific prompts
collections/        # Awesome-copilot collection
k8s/                # Kubernetes manifests
helm/               # Helm charts
```

## Security Model

- ActionGuard: Blocks dangerous patterns (rm -rf, 0.0.0.0, eval)
- SDK Source Guard: Only trusted package publishers
- PII Scanner: Credential detection before sync
- All services bind to 127.0.0.1 only

## Getting Started

```bash
# Clone repository
git clone https://github.com/SynchronizedLivingArchitecture/S.L.A.T.E.git
cd S.L.A.T.E

# Install with dashboard
python install_slate.py

# Check system status
python slate/slate_status.py --quick

# Deploy to Kubernetes
python slate/slate_k8s_deploy.py --deploy-kustomize local
```

## Chat Participant Commands

In VS Code with @slate extension:
- @slate /status - System health
- @slate /runner - Runner management
- @slate /workflow - Task management
- @slate /specs - Specification processing
- @slate /help - All commands
